summary: This bill, the Weapons Resupply, Stockpile, and Alliance–Israel Act, introduced in the U.S. Senate, aims to extend the authority for war reserves stockpiles. Specifically, it amends Section 12001(d) of the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2005, by pushing back the expiration date for this authority from January 1, 2027, to January 1, 2029.
